```js
const Chip = require("./Chip").default;

<Chip>Text-only chip</Chip>;
```

```js
const Chip = require("./Chip").default;

<Chip onClickDelete={() => alert("Delete!")}>Delete me</Chip>;
```

```js
const Chip = require("./Chip").default;

<Chip
  contact={
    <ChipContactText style={{ backgroundColor: "teal", color: "white" }}>
      A
    </ChipContactText>
  }
>
  Contact text
</Chip>;
```

```js
const Chip = require("./Chip").default;
const user = require("./user.jpg");

<Chip contact={<ChipContactImage src={user} />}>Contact image</Chip>;
```

```js
const Chip = require("./Chip").default;

<Chip onClick={() => alert("Clicked!")}>Button chip</Chip>;
```
